metadata.title: CVE-2024-35869 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:smb: client: guarantee refcounted children from parent sessionAvoid potential use-after-free bugs when walking DFS referrals,mounting and performing DFS failover by ensuring that all childrenfrom parent @tcon->ses are also refcounted.  They're all needed acrossthe entire DFS mount.  Get rid of @tcon->dfs_ses_list while we're atit, too.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
